item.title: Amiko Pay
item.description: Amiko Pay aims to become an implementation of the lightning network. So that previous presentation was a great setup. There’s a little bit more to Amiko Pay. If you look through the basic design of the lightning network, there’s a network of payment channels. There have been several variations of this idea. Lightning Network happens to be the best so far. What Amiko Pay aims to do is to focus on the nodes, and do the routing between nodes.
